summary: This document contains deposition testimony of Ghislaine Maxwell regarding her knowledge of Jeffrey Epstein's activities, including questions about underage recruitment and sexual activities at Epstein's properties. The deposition was taken in connection with a civil case in the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Primary subject of the deposition, questioned about her knowledge of Epstein's activities.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Central figure in the questioning, with Maxwell being asked about his activities and properties.

persons.name: Mr. Pagliuca
persons.context: Objected to questions during Maxwell's deposition.

connections.description: Maxwell was closely associated with Epstein, managing his properties and schedule.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell Deposition
events.description: Deposition of Ghislaine Maxwell regarding her knowledge of Jeffrey Epstein's activities.

events.title: Continued Deposition of Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: Continued questioning of Maxwell about Epstein's activities and properties.

locations: 9 East 71st Street, New York, New York
358 El Brillo Way, Palm Beach, Florida
49 Zorro Ranch Road, Stanley, New Mexico
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell denied knowledge of Jeffrey Epstein's alleged scheme to recruit underage girls for sexual massages.
Maxwell testified she was not aware of any sex toys or devices used in sexual activities at Epstein's Palm Beach house.
Maxwell claimed she was only aware of Epstein having sexual activities with herself and two other women on a few occasions.
Maxwell denied ever giving massages to anyone, including Epstein.
